name: necroscape
description:
you play as an old necromancer who can't jump. everyone's out to get you because of your affiliations with dark magic. what they don't know, is you can manipulate life and death to fly over their heads as a ghost after you die until you're resurrected. escape the bounty hunters and carry own with living your happy life of death

be careful though, as your ability is limited!

if you like this game, please follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/space_noomad
